name: Glint TD
description:
Title: Glint TD
Platform: Web
Genre: Tower Defense
Rating: E (ESRB)
Target Market: Casual (Puzzle/Strategy) 13-18

Description: Use Towers of Light to fight back against the every growing hordes of shadow. Survive as long as you can to keep the last glimmer of light alive.

Controls: Left Click to buy tower. Left click with tower in hand to place, Right click to refund.
